```{r}
longDf$evalMid <- abs(4-longDf$eval)
```

# Centrality Predicts Confidence

```{r}
m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ scale(outDegree)+ ( scale(outDegree) | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)

m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ scale(outDegree)*valence + ( scale(outDegree)*valence | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)

m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ scale(inDegree) + ( scale(inDegree) | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
```

# Extreme Responses

```{r}
m<-lmer(scale(evalMid) ~ scale(confidence) + ( scale(confidence) | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
```



```{r}
m<-lmer(scale(eval) ~ confidence + confidence2 + ( 1 | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)

m<-lmer(scale(eval) ~ confidence*COND + ( confidence | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
ggpredict(m, c("confidence","COND")) %>% plot()

m<-lmer(scale(eval) ~ confidence*valence + ( confidence + valence | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
ggpredict(m, c("confidence","valence")) %>% plot()

m<-lmer(eval ~ poly(confidence,2,raw=FALSE) + ( poly(confidence,2,raw=FALSE) | subID ) + ( 1 | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
library(ggeffects)
ggpredict(m, c("confidence")) %>% plot()
```

```{r}
m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ COND + ( 1 | subID ) + ( COND | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
ggpredict(m, c("CCOND")) %>% plot()

m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ COND * outDegree + ( 1 | subID ) + ( COND | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
ggpredict(m, c("outDegree","COND")) %>% plot()
```

```{r}
m<-lmer(scale(confidence) ~ COND + valence  + scale(eval) + ( 1 | subID ) + ( COND | traits), data=longDf)
summary(m)
ggpredict(m, c("outDegree","COND")) %>% plot()
```
